A

acquireTransactionManager() - Method in class org.microbean.jpa.org.eclipse.persistence.platform.server.cdi.CDISEPlatform.TransactionController
Returns a non-null TransactionManager.

C

CDISEPlatform - Class in org.microbean.jpa.org.eclipse.persistence.platform.server.cdi
A JMXServerPlatformBase that arranges things such that CDI, not JNDI, will be used to acquire a TransactionManager and MBeanServer.
CDISEPlatform(DatabaseSession) - Constructor for class org.microbean.jpa.org.eclipse.persistence.platform.server.cdi.CDISEPlatform
Creates a CDISEPlatform.
CDISEPlatform.TransactionController - Class in org.microbean.jpa.org.eclipse.persistence.platform.server.cdi
A JTATransactionController whose acquireTransactionManager() uses CDI, not JNDI, to return a TransactionManager instance.
cleanup() - Method in class org.microbean.jpa.weld.JpaInjectionServices
